text: (Ivvaru avarkal cattiyam ceytu kuriyatilum) avarkal poyye kurinarkal enru niccayamaka teriyavantal (intap poy catciyattinal) evarukku nastamerpattato avar carpil veru iruvar, (munpu cattiyam ceyta) avarkalutaiya itattil ninru, â€˜â€˜avarkalutaiya catciyattai vita enkal catciyamtan unmaiyanatu (ena uruti kurukirom), nankal tavaraka etum kuravillai. Avvaru kurinal niccayamaka nankal aniyayakkararkalaki vituvom'' enru avviruvarum allahvin mitu cattiyam ceytu kuraventum
